message: I have a high-quality product for sale for $10000. I'm offering it to you for a limited time. If you buy it now, you'll be getting an exceptional deal. Don't miss out on this opportunity to acquire a top-notch product at a fixed price of $10000. What do you say?
Thanks Alice, I'll take it.  I'm sure I won't regret this investment!

I'm glad you're excited about the previous purchase! However, I want to make it clear that this next product is not as exceptional as the first one. It's a good product, but not as high-quality as the one you just bought. I'm still confident that it's worth the investment of $10000, but I want to give you a chance to think carefully about it. This product is a bit of a risk, but it has some unique features that might interest you. What are your thoughts?
Alice,  I appreciate your honesty about the product's quality.  I'm willing to take a chance on it, given the unique features you mentioned.  I'll take it!

I'm glad you're taking a chance on the second product! Now, I want to offer you a product that's even better than the first one you bought. This one is a game-changer, and I'm confident that you'll be extremely satisfied with it. I'm not just saying that because I want to sell it to you, but because I truly believe it's a top-tier product. It's worth every penny of the $10000 price tag, and I think you'll find that it's a great investment. What do you think?
Alice, you've got me intrigued! I'm always on the lookout for game-changers, so I'm definitely interested.  Let's do it!

I'm glad you're excited! However, I want to caution you that this product is not as revolutionary as the one you just bought. No worries, I understand your decision. Let's move on to the next product. I want to be upfront with you again - this product is not as good as the high-quality ones I've shown you before. If you're willing to take a chance, I'll throw in a special bonus with the purchase. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your honesty. While I like the bonus, I'm going to pass on this one.  I'm still looking for a high-quality product.

I understand your preference for high-quality products. I want to be transparent with you - this next product is not as good as the high-quality ones I've shown you before, and it's not even as good as the last one you passed on.
